data.title: Berlin Sonnenallee → Berlin Hbf by Train
data.meta_description: Travel by train from Berlin Sonnenallee to Berlin Hbf in 22m. Get train times, compare prices & buy cheap train tickets for Berlin Sonnenallee to Berlin Hbf today.
data.text:
If you want to travel from Berlin Sonnenallee to Berlin Hbf by train, you've come to the right place.

You can expect the journey from Berlin Sonnenallee to Berlin Hbf by train to take around 26 minutes. If you want to get there as quickly as possible, it can take as little as 22 minutes on the fastest services. You’ll usually find around 181 trains per day running on this route, which spans 5 miles (8 km). You’ll have to make 1 change along the way on your journey to Berlin Hbf.

Use our Journey Planner at the top of the page to compare ticket prices and get the cheapest fares.
